In 2019, Convergences and Gawad Kalinga joined forces to co-create the “Barangay Walang Iwanan 2019” event that took place in the Philippines in January 2019.

The conversation continue in 2020 as all indicators on poverty and exclusion have increased due to the pandemic. While there is positive momentum on carbon reduction from decreased production and consumption, now is the right time to come together again, contextualise the issues within the impact of the global health crisis, and act with more urgency towards the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals and our call for a 3Zero World.

On October 16 and 17 in the Philippines, the first 3Zero Forum brought together nearly 600 participants on Zoom and more than 4,000 participants on Facebook. The exchanges allowed the sharing of ideas, best practices and tools and continue with the 3Zero Global Alliance!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||1px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

PARTNERS OF THE 3ZERO  PHILIPPINES FORUM

Thank you to the partners of the 3Zero Philippines 2020 Forum for their support and mobilisation. Join them and affirm your commitment to a 3Zero Philippines!

excerpt.rendered: In 2019, Convergences and Gawad Kalinga joined forces to co-create the “Barangay Walang Iwanan 2019” event that took place in the Philippines in January 2019. The conversation continue in 2020 as all indicators on poverty and exclusion have increased due to the pandemic. While there is positive momentum on carbon reduction from decreased production and […]
